divs: Sighting Detailsi looked in the sky and saw a fast moving red disc in my back yard and then it just went fast going up or disapered i was in my back yard looking at the sky and then a red disc poped into the sky and was moving really fast and we saw it for about 5 minits and then it disapeared then i saw a cloud that looked like a skeleton i was so scared when i first saw it then i was freaking out when it was gone
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There were no other sightings in Cincinnati on or around October 18th 2010
Summary: i looked in the sky and saw a fast moving red disc
